DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the health effects of benzene exposure in workers in Shanghai, China.
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to investigate the dose-response relationship between benzene exposure and blood diseases in Shanghai workers and to characterize genetic polymorphisms that are associated with increased risk of developing benzene hematotoxicity.
DOC.criteria: Worked for at least one year in a monitored environment Have at least one physical examination recorded History of cancer, radiation exposure, chemotherapy
